pages.title: Barrel
pages.text: Barrels are the only items that can be used to submit fluids. Like the cardboard box, the barrel is also available in 6 tiers.$(br)To fill a barrel, place it down and click it with a bucket. You can also fill barrels with fluid pipes from the top.
Barrels can be automatically filled in the $(l:packaging/packager)packager$(/l).$(br)To submit a barrel, just break the block and put it into the $(l:drone_delivery/drone_pad)drone pad$(/l).
